unlimited.title: Unlimited TikTok Downloads
unlimited.desc: Download TikTok videos as much as you want without any limits — totally free and easy to use. Our downloader lets you save your favorite videos anytime, anywhere.

noWatermark.title: No Watermarks
noWatermark.desc: Save TikTok videos in MP4 format without any watermarks or TikTok logos — clean videos ready for sharing or personal use.

formats.title: MP4 and MP3 Formats
formats.desc: Choose to download videos in high-quality MP4 or convert to MP3 audio. Whether you want the video or just the sound, our tool makes it easy.

howTo.title: How to Download TikTok Videos
howTo.desc: Simply paste the TikTok video link above, click “Download”, and then choose your preferred format and quality to download instantly. No registration or software needed.

howGetLink.question: How do I get the TikTok video link?
howGetLink.answer: Open the TikTok app or website, tap “Share” on the video, then select “Copy Link” to get the video URL.

howPaste.question: How do I paste the link and download?
howPaste.answer: Paste the copied URL into the input box above, click “Download” to get download options, then click a button to start downloading.

qualityOptions.question: What download quality options are available?
qualityOptions.answer: You can download audio only (MP3), standard video quality (SD), or high-quality video (HD) if available.

isFree.question: Is this service free and safe?
isFree.answer: Yes! Our downloader is completely free and respects your privacy. We do not store your downloads.

discordBot.title: Tikssave Bot on Discord
discordBot.desc: Tikssave is a powerful Discord bot that allows you to download TikTok videos directly from your server using simple slash commands. Invite the bot, paste your TikTok link, and receive a direct download link for fast and easy access.
